A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a great movie with unexpected plot twists and new jedi tricks never before seen. Before you rate this movie think of all the movies that get high ratings. This movie is worthy of a 4-5 star range. Giving this movie 3 stars or below means you think you should have skipped it. Any true Star Wars fan would never give it such a low rating. Don't follow the crowd...think for yourself before you rate it.
